com.burstly.lib.network.request
Class SafeAsyncTask<T>

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<Void,Void,T>
      com.burstly.lib.util.PrioritizedAsyncTask<T>
          com.burstly.lib.network.request.SafeAsyncTask<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbortableAsyncTask, ImageFetchTask
public abstract class SafeAsyncTask<T>
extends PrioritizedAsyncTask<T>

AsyncTask wrapper. Use this task everywhere in program to defend your application from "Unexpectedly closed". This implmentation shields from Runtime exceptions being thrown in "worker" backgroung thread. Instead of crashing it simply prints output to log.
Note: implementors MUST always call for super.doInBackground() as a first line in doInBackground()

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
